kickstart.post:
service tftp { socket_type = dgram protocol = udp wait = yes user = root server = /usr/sbin/in.tftpd server_args = --verbose --secure /tftpboot/pxelinux instances = 1 per_source = 11 cps = 1000 2 flags = IPv4 disable = no }
mkdir -p /tftpboot/pxelinux
cp /opt/stack/images/vmlinuz* /tftpboot/pxelinux cp /opt/stack/images/initrd.img* /tftpboot/pxelinux/
cp /boot/memtest86* /tftpboot/pxelinux/memtest
